dct_title_s: New household and commercial map of the United States
dct_alternative_sm: New household and commercial map of the United States.
dct_description_sm: 1 map on 2 sheets : col. ; 95 x 140 cm
Border includes flags of various countries, map of the world, and views of Washington, D.C., New York, Mount Vernon and the Capitol building.
Includes profiles of the continent along 42nd parallel, route for the Pacific Railroad and the North Atlantic.
Includes a circular chart which shows solar time variation from the National Observatory in Washington, D.C.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
